nodes.text: A waiter droid served customers at the Stone Grotto dinner club in the planet Bothawui's capital city of Drev'starn during the Galactic Civil War. In 3.5 ABY, the droid waited on a table of undercover Alliance Intelligence operatives, mistaking one of them for a courier associated with a crime syndicate who was dining at the club at the same time, thus setting off an ensuing hostage situation between the Intelligence operatives and two Rodian kidnappers.
